pullrequest.title: Added gui-client-plugin option. Leave -g to load System Plugins (issue #2279)

content.raw: I agree on the ideal situation. The problem is that I did not find a way to determinate if a plugin is a system plugin or a gui plugin in runtime without making the simulator to crash. If we can determine the type, we can invoke the proper loading mechanism and the problem should be fully solved (if I'm not wrong).
content.html: I agree on the ideal situation. The problem is that I did not find a way to determinate if a plugin is a system plugin or a gui plugin in runtime without making the simulator to crash. If we can determine the type, we can invoke the proper loading mechanism and the problem should be fully solved (if I'm not wrong).
